text: Their newest addition! Eddie Redmayne and wife Hannah Redmayne have welcomed their second child together. The pair announced their son ’ s arrival in the London Times : “ On 10th March 2018 to Hannah ( Bagshawe ) and Edward, a son, Luke Richard Bagshawe Redmayne, brother to Iris. ” The couple revealed in November 2017 that they were expecting baby No. 2. “ Eddie and Hannah are delighted to confirm they are expecting a second child, ” a spokesperson for the Oscar winner, 36, told Us Weekly at the time.
